TopicTitle: When will the patch be available?

Articles.Content:
I was looking forward to the 1.03 release, which is way overdue imo, however despite what it says on the website, it is not available on GoG. Neither 1.03 nor 1.04.

So my simple question: when will the patch that is tagged as "available now" actually be available?

That depends on GoG. Squad can only send GoG the update, it is up to GoG when they push it out. The same goes for any other retailer who may offer KSP.

Steam are extremely quick with updates.

Not sure about you but I have a lot of GoG games (GoG 4 lyfe!) and their updates have always been a bit patchy (heh), with some patches appearing in a day, others after a few days.

Gotta be a little patient that's all ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

Also, moving to Kerbal Network!
